song.title: Yesu Aliniita, "Njoo"
song.englishTitle: I Heard the Voice of Jesus Say

verses.verse: Yesu aliniita, "Njoo, Raha iko kwangu, Kichwa chako ukilaze Kifuani mwangu." Nilikwenda kwake mara, Sana nilichoka; Nikapata kwake raha Na furaha tena.
Yesu aliniita, "Njoo, Dunia i giza, Ukinitazama, nuru Takung'arizia." Nilikwenda kwake mara, Yeye Jua langu, Ni kila wakati mwanga Safarini mwangu.
